data.Name: Taarka
data.Bio: Taarka, led by David Tiller and Enion Pelta-Tiller, is the natural next step in the evolution of music. The incarnation features high-energy performance and innovative compositions, expanding a musical canvas by drawing on the sounds of old and new from world folk, jazz, classical, and rock energy into a synergy of swirling gypsy world dervish for a truly unique and exciting brand of music performed master musicianship. David Tiller - mandolin, guitar Read more on Last.fm
